quote: But if not, may fire come out of A·bimʹe·lech and consume the leaders of Sheʹchem and Beth-milʹlo, and may fire come out of the leaders of Sheʹchem and Beth-milʹlo and consume A·bimʹe·lech.”
Now Noah started off as a farmer, and he planted a vineyard.
Then he said to them: “You, though, who do you say I am?” Peter answered: “The Christ of God.”
